name: Cook-Out: A Sandwich Tale
summary:
Set within the cook’s cabin of a fairytale forest, Cook-Out: A Sandwich Tale is a wacky and whimsical adventure - brought to you by the creators of Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs, Bait! and Blaston - that challenges up to four players to work together to keep the orders coming for a hungry cast of enchanted creatures in this multiplayer VR game.

As players progress through the increasingly hectic levels of the cooking game, they’ll not only prepare meals but will also need to fight off a number of nasty customers who seem absolutely set on making trouble -- like jesters who will hide parts of orders, or thieves who will keep pilfering ingredients.

Resolution Games has also cooked up a new casual mode for virtual chefs to take a break from the wild kitchen and cook up meals at their leisure.

So put on your aprons… things are about to get messy!
